description: Test suite for game logic utility functions in a Tic-Tac-Toe project, including tests for board initialization, move validation, winner calculation, and draw condition.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner ('X' or 'O') based on the current game board row or column.

methods.name: initBoard
methods.description: Initializes and returns an empty Tic-Tac-Toe game board with 9 null cells.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game board is a draw (full with no winner).

methods.name: validateMove
methods.description: Validates a move at a given index on the game board, checking bounds and occupancy.
